item.title: [Python] COVID-19 Hokkaido Data Edition (1) Initial data creation by scraping
item.description: ## Table of contents COVID-19 Hokkaido data edition (1) Initial data creation by scraping etc. ←This article! COVID-19 Hokkaido data edition ②Open data + automatic update COVID-19 Hokkaido data edition ③ Fully automated ![Screenshot 2020-03-10 17.25.46.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/73197/db6e9de7-3071-9836-9aba-(be5d04c240d3.png) Introduction Tokyo official corona virus protection sitewasreleasedbyTokyoandCodeforJapan,anditssourcecodewasreleasedonGitHubunderMITlicense…Inotherwords,eveninotherprefectures,youcancreateawebapplicationthatvisualizesinthesameway(ifyoucanpreparesimilardata)(althoughyouactuallyneedserverresourcesetc.). This is a groundbreaking initiative. Well, that’s why the movements around the country have become more active, and in Hokkaido, volunteers with diverse backgrounds such as Code for Sapporo, IT companies in Hokkaido, and local government employees JUST Road IT was formed, and a project that was forked from Tokyo on March 6 was released at noon on March 9.
